CIRCULAR
NO. 16/2016
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 29/2002
dated 24/09/2002,
the Personal
Security Officer (PSO) will be allowed to accompany the Union Home Minister during hisjourney
by charter aircraft, including helicopter services under general aviation, either Govt. or Private.
Weapons and ammunition of the PSOs are permitted to carryon their persons or in their hand
baggage on board the flight. The weapon will be carried in fully unloaded condition i.e. weapons
and ammunition shall be kept separately while accompanying the dignitary on board the aircraft.
It is also clarified that this permission is not allowed for commercial aircraft.
